mapper.select: select ID,PAR_ID,DISEASE_SCREENING,HEARING_SCREENING,CREATE_TIME,UPDATE_TIME from APP_PARENTING_EARLY_STAGE_RECORD where ID = #{ id}
mapper.insert: insert into APP_PARENTING_EARLY_STAGE_RECORD (ID,PAR_ID,DISEASE_SCREENING,HEARING_SCREENING,CREATE_TIME,UPDATE_TIME) values ( #{ id, javaType=String, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ parId, javaType=String, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ diseaseScreening, javaType=String, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ hearingScreening, javaType=String, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ createTime, javaType=Date, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{ updateTime, javaType=Date, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} )
mapper.update: update APP_PARENTING_EARLY_STAGE_RECORD set PAR_ID = #{ parId, javaType=String, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DISEASE_SCREENING = #{ diseaseScreening, javaType=String, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, HEARING_SCREENING = #{ hearingScreening, javaType=String, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_TIME = #{ createTime, javaType=Date, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATE_TIME = #{ updateTime, javaType=Date, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where ID = #{ id}
